title: (x) Fastack logo slanted square strict geometric sans - Beast Machines {Ignacio}
content:
Hi friend

Please help me id the font used for FASTACH

Thanks in advance

Miguel

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150417144633im_/http:/typophile.com/files/fastack_5774.jpg)
author: hernando

comments.content:
Dear friends

Is there a way to id the font?

Hi friends

is there something looks like this font ? something close ...please im desesperado!!!!!!!

Thanks in advance

Miguel Hernando

I think it is [Beast Machines](http://web.archive.org/web/20150417144633/http:/www.dafont.com/font.php?file=beast_machines&page=1&nb_ppp_old=50&text=F+A+S+T+a+c+k&nb_ppp=50&psize=m&classt=alpha), slanted, squooshed and slightly modified.
